description:
For the minimalist adventurer who values quality over quantity, the Traveler’s Jacket is the technical garment that will meet all your needs in the forest, but also in everyday life, thanks to its versatility and adjustable fit.

Made of 65% recycled polyester and 35% cotton canvas, the Traveler’s Jacket has a ventilated back with mesh lining and underarm vents to allow you to move freely while letting the air cool you down. Whether it’s a hike in the woods or a fishing trip in a canoe, features like the fishing pole attachment at the chest, make it an all-purpose jacket. An essential for all your trips, no matter how different they might be from one another.

Technical with its 4 cargo pockets, two handwarmer pockets and interior pocket, it’s also functional with its adjustable drawcord hem and adjustable waist straps that allow you to wear it both, for working outside and as an everyday coat.

Even though it was designed for warmer seasons, you can easily keep wearing it when fall arrives. Add a tech fleece underneath to ensure you stay warm without compromising mobility!
name: Hooke Travel Jacket - Mens
